snippet: Lt. Gov. Ken Ard pleaded guilty to charges of spending campaign funds on personal expenses and fabricating donations.
abstract: Lieutenant Governor Ken Ard of South Carolina resigns and pleads guilty to criminal charges of spending campaign funds on personal expenses and fabricating donations.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Gov. Ken Ard pleaded guilty to charges of spending campaign funds on personal expenses and fabricating donations.

headline.main: No. 2 Official in S. Carolina Steps Down Over Charges
headline.print_headline: No. 2 Official In S. Carolina Steps Down Over Charges
